metadata.description: Better! Stronger! Faster...and smaller?! Steve Austin and Jaime Sommers are the newest students at A.S.I. -- the Academy of Science Intelligence, a school for the unique and gifted. They're also both cyborgs -- human kids with a variety of high-tech body parts and modifications. Can these two outsiders put aside their shyness, and a growing rivalry, in time to take a stand against alien invaders who are determined to ruin the A.S.I. Track and Field Day? And if that isn't enough, each Li'l book comes with a two-page activity sheet!
metadata.name: Li'l Bionic Kids
